name: Wayfaring Strangers Demo
description:
This is a proof of concept demo for Wayfaring Strangers, an action-adventure semi-open world roguelite with a focus on character based narratives.  Imagine if the Legend of Zelda met Supergiant's Hades.  

  • Survive an unforgiving world plagued with portals that do not guarantee the destination you want. 
  • Collect new items and weapons to make your avatar stronger.
  • Uncover the secrets of the Scarred World.
  • Become a beacon of hope - unite the divided people and invite them into your Homestead.

The game is still currently in development and looking for constructive feedback.
